title: Texture Bug
body: . Gameplay When i load into a game allies and enemy champions models are not there i can only see abilities i can also not see camps/minions/baron/dragon/turrets i have repaired it but it didnt help and now i dont know what to do

replies.body:
It sounds like you client isn't able to pull that information up due to a problem connecting to the server. To resolve this, I encourage you to take a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which provides the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if you still see issues after working through those steps.
